user_story: As a customer, I want to place an order so that I can buy products online

acceptance_criteria.text:
GIVEN the customer is authenticated
AND the shopping cart contains at least one product
WHEN the customer confirms the order
THEN the system validates the cart
AND processes the payment
AND creates the order

GIVEN the customer is authenticated
AND the shopping cart contains at least one product
WHEN the customer confirms the order
THEN the system validates the cart
AND processes the e-wallet payment
AND creates the order

GIVEN the payment is declined
WHEN the customer submits the order
THEN the system notifies the customer of the payment failure

user_story: As a customer, I want to checkout so that I can complete my purchase

acceptance_criteria.text:
GIVEN the customer is authenticated
AND the shopping cart contains products
WHEN the customer submits checkout
THEN the system validates the cart
AND processes the payment
AND completes the checkout

GIVEN the shopping cart is empty
WHEN checkout is submitted
THEN the system displays an empty cart error message

user_story: As a customer, I want to reset my password so that I can log in when I forget it

acceptance_criteria.text:
GIVEN the customer provides a registered email address
WHEN the customer submits a password reset request
THEN the system sends a password reset link to the email

GIVEN the email address is not registered
WHEN the customer submits a password reset request
THEN the system displays an email not found message

GIVEN the reset link is expired
WHEN the customer opens the reset link
THEN the system displays an invalid link message
